channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge rules suit challenging DOGE and Elon Musk's power over government can continue
item.description: A judge has denied a request to dismiss a lawsuit alleging Elon Musk and DOGE are wielding unconstitutional power within the government. Separately, M...

item.title: In 'The Party's Interests Come First,' Joseph Torigian tries to understand Xi Jinping through his father
item.description: In his forthcoming book , The Party's Interests Come First , American University professor Joseph Torigian writes about Xi Jinping's father, Xi Zhongx...

item.title: Netanyahu says Hamas leader Mohammed Sinwar has been killed by Israeli forces
item.description: Speaking on Wednesday in the Knesset, Israel's parliament, Netanyahu said that Sinwar was killed in an Israeli airstrike, but did not provide specific...

item.title: Trump's foreign policy: deals with allies over diplomacy with rivals
item.description: When President Trump talks about his foreign policy, he often frames it as a business deal. He says much less about conventional diplomacy, like endin...

item.title: Greetings from the Galápagos Islands, where the blue-footed booby shows its colors
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international correspondents share snapshots of moments from their lives and work around the wor...

item.title: Trump to pardon reality TV stars Todd and Julie Chrisley
item.description: "Your parents are going to be free and clean," President Trump told the couple's children in a phone call.

item.title: Harvard agrees to relinquish early photos of slaves, ending a long legal battle
Watch: BBC team flees drone attack in Ukraine
item.description: Yogita Limaye was reporting from the town of Rodynske when a blast was heard nearby.

item.title: JD Vance: "Crypto finally has a champion" in the White House
item.description: Vice President JD Vance spoke at the Bitcoin 2025 Conference in Las Vegas, as the Trump administration has leaned into cryptocurrency.

item.title: Inmate known as "Devil of the Ozarks" escapes from prison dressed as officer
item.description: New details are emerging about Grant Hardin, the escaped Arkansas inmate dubbed the "Devil of the Ozarks." The manhunt for Hardin, a former police chi...

item.title: Can Trump give Harvard's funding to trade schools? It's not that easy
item.description: President Trump wants to divert federal funds from Harvard to trade schools. But experts say the process isn't that simple.

item.title: German chancellor promises to help Ukraine produce long-range missiles
item.description: Friedrich Merz said earlier there were "no longer" any range restrictions on weapons supplied by Kyiv's Western allies.

item.title: Israel PM says Hamas's Gaza chief Mohammed Sinwar has been killed
item.description: Mohammed Sinwar was the target of a Israeli strike on the courtyard of the European hospital in Khan Younis on 13 May.

item.title: Namibia marks colonial genocide for first time with memorial day
item.description: Concentration camps and pseudoscientific experiments were used by German officials to torture and kill.

item.title: May 20: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: President Trump meets with House GOP to push his budget bill; First responders work to save "hope and dreams" from Palm Springs fertility clinic attac...

item.title: The terrifying new weapon changing the war in Ukraine
item.description: The BBC reports from Donetsk where swarms of fibre optic drones give Russia the edge as Ukraine defends towns behind the front line.

item.title: New Orleans jail escapees caught following car chase in Texas; 2 inmates still on the run
item.description: Police say one of the New Orleans jail escapees who was captured on Monday was found with the help of an anonymous tip from a concerned citizen.

item.title: Manhunt launched for ex-police chief known as ‘Devil in the Ozarks’ after his escape from prison
